posts.post_content: I GOT IT! NO LONGER Looking for a nice example, graded or raw. It can be lightly creased, but not marked or scuffed, and should not have too much corner wear. Thanks, Caleb!

Hi! I have a PSA 3 that I think should honestly grade higher, no creases, and corners are in incredible shape. Am not actively looking to sell it, but would still consider. Can send you an email with pictures if you'd like?
That would be great. I sent you a PM with my email address for the scans. Thanks.
